word_mean: 腮腺炎：由病毒，如流行性腮腺炎病毒和柯萨奇病毒以及由包括金黄色葡萄球菌，肺炎球菌和链球菌等细菌引起的腮腺炎症

sentence.Network_en: The blood amylase is usually elevated as a result of parotitis.
sentence.Network_cn: 腮腺炎常引起血清淀粉酶增高.

sentence.Network_en: Routine laboratory tests frequently indicate a relative lymphocytosis in uncomplicated parotitis.
sentence.Network_cn: 无合并症的腮腺炎,其实验室常规检查常显示淋巴细胞相对增多.

sentence.Network_en: Other causes of parotid swelling are suppurative parotitis.
sentence.Network_cn: 腮腺肿胀的其它原因是化浓性腮腺炎.
